translations: adj.没有遗嘱的；[法] 未按遗嘱处理的

phrs.translation: 无遗嘱者, 无遗嘱而去世者, 未留遗嘱的, 没立遗嘱的
遗嘱继承, 无遗嘱继承, 法定继承, 无遗嘱的继承
死时没有遗嘱, 死时没有留下遗嘱

sentences.sentence: I know he did not leave any valid WILL because he died intestate.
sentences.translation: 我知道他没有留下任何合法的意志因为他死了没有留下遗嘱。

sentences.sentence: The thesis analyses the tendency in correlative aspects of testamental succession and intestate succession.
sentences.translation: 从遗嘱继承制度和无遗嘱继承制度的相关方面可了解这一变迁。

sentences.sentence: When someone dies intestate, the property automatically go to the survive partner unless there are children.
sentences.translation: 当某人无遗嘱死亡，财产自动归幸存的伴侣，除非他还有孩子。
